title: Influences of Z = 100 and N = 152 deformed shells on Kπ = 8−  isomers and rotational bands in N = 150 isotones
speaker: 吕明熹
paperTitle: Influences of Z = 100 and N = 152 deformed shells on <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="inline-block"><msup><mi>K</mi><mi>π</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo></msup></math> isomers and rotational bands in N = 150 isotones
paperAbstract: The <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="inline-block"><msup><mi>K</mi><mi>π</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo></msup></math> isomeric states and rotational bands in the even-even N=150 isotones  with 94⩽Z⩽104 are investigated by the cranked shell model (CSM) with pairing correlations treated by the particle-number-conserving (PNC) method. The experimental band-head energies and kinematic moments of inertia (MOIs) are reproduced quite well by the PNC-CSM calculation. The two-neutron state with configuration ...
